summary: This bill, the Clean Energy Demonstration Transparency Act of 2025, amends the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to increase reporting requirements for clean energy demonstration projects. It mandates the Secretary to submit semi-annual reports to relevant committees in the House and Senate, as well as make the reports publicly available online. The reports must include contracts, milestones, and any modifications to the project's scope, schedule, or budget. The bill aims to improve transparency regarding government-funded clean energy projects.
